title: How to write a letter to my school principal about problems declining growth in my school - Quora

response.answer_text: Identify the problem. Find findings on why it has become a problem. Why is there a need to address this problem ? What can you do to reduce or prevent the problem? What should the school do about it, in your opinion. Knock on his door, explain the situation , and drop him your paper in an envelope which explains all of the above and more. You can also find his/her e-mail and send it to them, but I recommend meeting them in person.
